GENERAL WEATHER FORECAST FOR NEXT 36 HOURS
Issued at 04.00 p.m. on 18 February 2024

A
 few showers may occur in Eastern and Uva provinces.

S
howers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in Western and Sabaragamuwa provinces
after 4.00 p.m.

F
airly strong winds about (30-35) kmph can be expected at times in eastern slopes of the central
hills and in Northern, North-central, North-western, Uva, Southern and Eastern provinces and
in Kandy district.

T
he public is kindly requested to take adequate precautions to minimize damages caused by temporary
localized strong winds and lightning during thundershowers.
